page.title: 02NORTH SCARLE VILLAGE
page.content: North Scarle is a small rural village of about five hundred people.There is a fourteenth century church in the village but no vicar lives at the rectory.He comes from Swinderby.There is also a chapel.The Minister comes from Lincoln.There is a sunday school at the chapel and also a youth club.We have a night club that has bingos,Discos,One armed bandits and a pool table.There are also two pubs,The White Hart and the Sedan Chair which is a home now. There is a playing field which children can go to.We have a primary school. There are a number of firms like D.F.W.,Porters, Daylay,Russells,Redland,and there is also a Garage on Swinderby road.
